Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: jjrose
Reviews.Content: I fell in love with this relatively inexpensive little digital camera and used it for a couple of years before I lost it.  I tried replacing it with a Fuji and, well, there was a cheap little camera in every sense of the word.  Then I saw this one used for a third of the price and I was assured that if it didn't work right that as usual Amazon and the seller would be standing behind it - so I bought it and am so happy with it.  It is a great little camera - when I went through the menus, etc. with the Fuji it felt like a toy - this camera feels professional - easy to understand- and the look and the feel is quite elegant.  I admit as I was looking to replace this when it got lost and I looked for another, I read reviews saying this is not a good camera - I strongly disagree - that was a review that made me wonder what they were looking at.  I assure you this is a fine little camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Polaroid 12MP Ready-to-Use Digital Camera bundle includes a CD-ROM software, USB cable, wrist strap, and 2 batteries.
12 Megapixels allows for pictures with sharp detail; 2.7" Color LCD screen for previewing images before you shoot
3x Optical zoom; 5x Digital Zoom; 32 MB built-in storage
Anti-Shake Image Stabilization, and Face-Tracking for perfect faces in your picture.
Smile and blink detection; Red-Eye Removal; PictBridge compatible
ProductInfo.Name: Polaroid 12.0 MP Digital Camera i1236
